name: kudos
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the public admiration that a person receives as a result of a particular achievement or position in society: Being an actor has a certain amount of kudos attached to it. Compare
praise noun

praise, admiration, and fame received for an achievement: Women’s organizations have been getting kudos for their service activities.
